name: Rep.Air
description:
Welcome to Rep.air! Gradually it will appear different disasters on earth and you will have to repair them. You are the last hope to save the planet!
To move and reach the threat use the WASD keys, Once you are on it you will have to use the appropriate skill, to use this press the numbers 1, 2, 3 or 4 depending on the existing threat. Be careful, if you use an incorrect skill the threat will continue and the ability will be canceled until a certain time passes. Good luck!
